alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:06AM MST until January 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph resulting in blowing or drifting snow. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains, Dripping Springs, Globe/Miami and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
